# `ListPickerItem` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | Yes | Unique identifier for the list picker item |
| subtitle | `string` | No | Additional text providing more details about the item. |
| title | `string` | Yes | The main text displayed for the item. |
| selected | `boolean` | Yes | Whether the item is selected. |
